name: Charmander
reason: These are great moves to have before evolving!

name: Charmaleon
reason: These are great moves to have before evolving to Charzard. Especially dragon rage, it is really powerful!

name: Charzard
reason: Wing attack is stab and it will help with fighting types. Dragon claw will help with batttling against Dragon types.

name: Squirtle
reason: Withdraw will allow squirtle to increase his defense thus allowing it to survive more hits

name: Wartortle
reason: The move bite is extrememly helpful when battling psychic and ghost types!

name: Blastoise
reason: Brick break will against ice/rock and steel types. Scald chance of burning a pokemon during battle is awesome!

name: Bulbasaur
reason: Leech seed will enable bulbasaur to always regain health in each turn and poison powerder is great for damage over time!

name: Ivysaur
reason: Leech seed and poison powder remain for obvious reasons. Razor leaf is strong than vine whip.

name: Venusaur
reason: Earthquake will do well against fire/rock and steel types. And poison powder for that sweet damage over time!
